Description:
In the southwest quadrant of Calgary, you can find a Spiritleaf Cannabis Dispensary now open in the pleasant neighbourhood of Canyon Meadows. This small community offers excellent access to one of the cities favourite green spaces, Fish Creek Provincial Park, which has plenty of pedestrian paths and hosts various local wildlife. There is a C-Train LRT system for residents and the Southcentre Mall nearby. 

Spiritleaf aims to be the most knowledgeable and trusted source of recreational cannabis. We believe in connecting people in a world that is deeply divided. We believe that everyone matters equally, regardless of status, age, ethnicity or creed. We aim to foster genuine community spirit through what we stand for, whom we serve and the products we provide. There’s so much to see and experience. Learn more about the recreational Cannabis retail experience by visiting a Spiritleaf Cannabis Dispensary near you.

At Nova Cannabis we carry an outstanding line of products and top brands representing the best in flowers, oils, capsule, seeds, pre-rolls, edibles and more. But, we’re more than just the product. Our Customer Experience Representatives are ready to help you navigate strains, product types and the perfect accessories for making the most out of every moment. Walk around and ask questions, because nobody knows what you need better than we do.

Please be advised that the THC and CBD percentages provided are the median of the range provided by the licensed producer. For exact THC and CBD product contents, please consult with a Customer Experience Representative in store.

As a result of new regulations by the Government of Alberta, we require the use of face masks in-store during order pick-up. Be sure to bring government-issued ID showing you are 18+.  Please use cannabis responsibly and don’t drive while impaired.
